name: oj-n-box
description: An interactive data visualization (typically found in Human Capital Management applications) in which employees are grouped and compared across two dimensions.  Each dimension can be split into multiple ranges.

animationOnDataChange.description: Specifies the animation that is applied on data changes.

animationOnDisplay.description: Specifies the animation that is shown on initial display.

cellContent.description: The content the cells will display. "auto" switches between nodes and cell counts based on available space. "counts" forces the NBox to always render cell counts.

cellMaximize.description: Whether or not the cell maximize/de-maximize gestures are enabled.

cells.description: The list of cells. Also accepts a Promise for deferred data rendering. No data will be rendered if the Promise is rejected.

column.description: The id of the column containing this cell.

label.description: The text for the cell label.

labelHalign.description: The halign value for the cell label.

labelStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of the cell label.

maximizedSvgClassName.description: The CSS style class for this cell. Used for customizing the maximized cell background and border.

maximizedSvgStyle.description: The CSS style object for this cell. Used for customizing the maximized cell background and border.

minimizedSvgClassName.description: The CSS style class for this cell. Used for customizing the minimized cell background and border.

minimizedSvgStyle.description: The CSS style object for this cell. Used for customizing the minimized cell background and border.

row.description: The id of the row containing this cell.

shortDesc.description: The description of this cell. This is used for accessibility.

showCount.description: Determines when to display the cell count label (extra info displayed after primary cell label). "off" never show the count label. "on" always show the count label. Show countLabel value if specified, otherwise use a simple node count. "auto" show the count label if countLabel attribute is defined.

svgClassName.description: The CSS style class for this cell. Used for customizing the cell background and border.

svgStyle.description: The CSS style object for this cell. Used for customizing the cell background and border.

columns.description: The list of columns. Also accepts a Promise for deferred data rendering. No data will be rendered if the Promise is rejected.

id.description: The id of the column. Used to identify this column.

label.description: The text for the column label.

labelStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of the column label.

columnsTitle.description: The text for the title on the column edge.

countLabel.description: A function that returns custom text for the cell count labels.

groupAttributes.description: An array of attributes to style the group nodes with. Any attributes not listed will be ignored.

groupBehavior.description: Specifies how nodes should be grouped.

hiddenCategories.description: An array of category strings used for category filtering. Data items with a category in hiddenCategories will be filtered.

highlightMatch.description: The matching condition for the highlightedCategories property. By default, highlightMatch is 'all' and only items whose categories match all of the values specified in the highlightedCategories array will be highlighted. If highlightMatch is 'any', then items that match at least one of the highlightedCategories values will be highlighted.

highlightedCategories.description: An array of category strings used for category highlighting. Data items with a category in highlightedCategories will be highlighted.

hoverBehavior.description: Defines the behavior applied when hovering over data items.

labelTruncation.description: Determines node label truncation behavior. Labels are always truncated if limited by container (e.g. cell, dialog) width. Optionally, NBox can further truncate node labels to increase the number of nodes visible to the user. "on" allows label truncation to increase number of visible nodes. "ifRequired" only allows truncation when limited by container width.

maximizedColumn.description: The id of the column to be maximized.

maximizedRow.description: The id of the row to be maximized.

nodes.description: The list of nodes. Also accepts a Promise for deferred data rendering. No data will be rendered if the Promise is rejected.

borderColor.description: The color of the node border.

borderWidth.description: The width of the node border.

categories.description: An optional array of additional category strings corresponding to this data item. This enables highlighting and filtering of individual data items through interactions with other visualization elements. Defaults to node's id if unspecified.

color.description: The background color of this node.

column.description: The column id for this node.

groupCategory.description: The group category this node belongs to. Nodes with the same groupCategory will be grouped together.

icon.description: Defines the primary icon for this node.

borderColor.description: The border color of this icon.

borderRadius.description: The border radius of this icon. CSS border-radius values accepted. Note that non-% values (including unitless) get interpreted as 'px'.

borderWidth.description: The border width of this icon.

color.description: The fill color of this icon.

pattern.description: The fill pattern of this icon.

shape.description: The shape of this icon. Can take the name of a built-in shape or the svg path commands for a custom shape.

source.description: The URL of an image to display for this icon.

svgClassName.description: The CSS style class defining the style of this icon.

svgStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of this icon.

indicatorColor.description: The background color for the indicator section of this node.

indicatorIcon.description: Defines the indicator icon for this node.

borderColor.description: The border color of this indicator icon.

borderRadius.description: The border radius of this indicator icon. CSS border-radius values accepted. Note that non-% values (including unitless) get interpreted as 'px'.

borderWidth.description: The border width of this indicator icon.

color.description: The fill color of this indicator icon.

height.description: The height of this indicator icon.

opacity.description: The opacity of this indicator icon.

pattern.description: The fill pattern of this indicator icon.

shape.description: The shape of this indicator icon. Can take the name of a built-in shape or the svg path commands for a custom shape.

source.description: The URL of an image to display for this indicator icon.

svgClassName.description: The CSS style class defining the style of this indicator icon.

svgStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of this indicator icon.

width.description: The width of this indicator icon.

label.description: The text for the node label.

row.description: The row id for this node.

secondaryLabel.description: The text for the secondary node label.

shortDesc.description: The description of this node. This is used for accessibility and also for customizing the tooltip text.

svgClassName.description: The CSS style class defining the style of this node.

svgStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of this node.

xPercentage.description: An optional horizontal position (as a percentage) to be used in the average position calculation when grouping across cells.

yPercentage.description: An optional vertical position (as a percentage) to be used in the average position calculation when grouping across cells.

otherColor.description: The color for the "other" group nodes.

otherThreshold.description: The threshold for aggregating nodes into an "other" group node.

rows.description: The list of rows. Also accepts a Promise for deferred data rendering. No data will be rendered if the Promise is rejected.

id.description: The id of the row. Used to identify this row.

label.description: The text for the row label.

labelStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of the row label.

rowsTitle.description: The text for the title on the row edge.

selection.description: An array containing the ids of the selected nodes.

styleDefaults.description: An object defining the style defaults for this NBox.

animationDuration.description: The duration of the animations in milliseconds. The default value comes from the CSS and varies based on theme.

cellDefaults.description: An object defining the style defaults for cells.

labelHalign.description: The halign value for the cell label.

labelStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of the cell labels. The default value comes from the CSS and varies based on theme.

maximizedSvgStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the styles of the cell background and border when the cell is maximized. The default value comes from the CSS and varies based on theme.

minimizedSvgStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the styles of the cell background and border when the cell is minimized. The default value comes from the CSS and varies based on theme.

showCount.description: Determines when to display the cell count label.

svgStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the styles of the cell background and border. The default value comes from the CSS and varies based on theme.

columnLabelStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of the column labels. The default value comes from the CSS and varies based on theme.

columnsTitleStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of the columns title. The default value comes from the CSS and varies based on theme.

hoverBehaviorDelay.description: Specifies initial hover delay in ms for highlighting data items.

nodeDefaults.description: An object defining the style defaults for nodes.

borderColor.description: The default color of the node borders. The default value varies based on theme.

borderWidth.description: The default width of the node borders. The default value varies based on theme.

color.description: The default background color of the nodes. The default value comes from the CSS and varies based on theme.

iconDefaults.description: An object defining the style defaults for the node icons.

borderColor.description: The default border color of the node icons. The default value varies based on theme.

borderRadius.description: The default border radius of the node icons. CSS border-radius values accepted. Note that non-% values (including unitless) get interpreted as 'px'. The default value varies based on theme.

borderWidth.description: The default border width of the node icons. The default value varies based on theme.

color.description: The default fill color of the node icons.

height.description: The default height of the node icons. If the value is 0, the height will be automatically based on the remaining node contents.

opacity.description: The default opacity of the node icons.

pattern.description: The default fill pattern of the node icons.

shape.description: The default shape of the node icons. Can take the name of a built-in shape or the svg path commands for a custom shape.

source.description: The URL of an image to display by default for the node icons.

width.description: The default width of the node icons. If the value is 0, the width will be automatically based on the remaining node contents.

indicatorColor.description: The default background color of the node indicator sections.

indicatorIconDefaults.description: An object defining the style defaults for the node indicator icons.

borderColor.description: The default border color of the node indicator icons. The default value varies based on theme.

borderRadius.description: The default border radius of the node indicator icons. CSS border-radius values accepted. Note that non-% values (including unitless) get interpreted as 'px'. The default value varies based on theme.

borderWidth.description: The default border width of the node indicator icons. The default value varies based on theme.

color.description: The default fill color of the node indicator icons.

height.description: The default height of the node indicator icons. The default value varies based on theme.

opacity.description: The default opacity of the node indicator icons.

pattern.description: The default fill pattern of the node indicator icons.

shape.description: The default shape of the node indicator icons. Can take the name of a built-in shape or the svg path commands for a custom shape.

source.description: The URL of an image to display by default for the node indicator icons.

width.description: The default width of the node indicator icons. The default value varies based on theme.

labelStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of the node labels. The default value comes from the CSS and varies based on theme.

secondaryLabelStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of the node secondary labels. The default value comes from the CSS and varies based on theme.

rowLabelStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of the row labels. The default value comes from the CSS and varies based on theme.

rowsTitleStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of the rows title. The default value comes from the CSS and varies based on theme.

tooltip.description: An object containing an optional callback function for tooltip customization.

renderer.description: A function that returns a custom tooltip for the NBox nodes. The function takes a dataContext argument, provided by the NBox, with the following properties: parentElement: The tooltip element. The function can directly modify or append content to this element. id: The id of the hovered node. label: The label of the hovered node. secondaryLabel: The secondary label of the hovered node. color: The color of the hovered node. indicatorColor: The indicator color of the hovered node. row: The id of the row containing the hovered node. column: The id of the column containing the hovered node. componentElement: The NBox element. The function should return an Object that contains only one of the two properties: insert: HTMLElement | string - An HTML element, which will be appended to the tooltip, or a tooltip string. preventDefault: true - Indicates that the tooltip should not be displayed. It is not necessary to return {preventDefault:false} to display tooltip, since this is a default behavior.

touchResponse.description: Data visualizations require a press and hold delay before triggering tooltips and rollover effects on mobile devices to avoid interfering with page panning, but these hold delays can make applications seem slower and less responsive. For a better user experience, the application can remove the touch and hold delay when data visualizations are used within a non scrolling container or if there is sufficient space outside of the visualization for panning. If touchResponse is touchStart the element will instantly trigger the touch gesture and consume the page pan events if the element does not require an internal feature that requires a touch start gesture like scrolling. If touchResponse is auto, the element will behave like touchStart if it determines that it is not rendered within scrolling content and if panning is not available for those elements that support the feature.

trackResize.description: Defines whether the element will automatically render in response to changes in size. If set to off, then the application is responsible for calling refresh to render the element at the new size.

translations.description:
A collection of translated resources from the translation bundle, or null if this
component has no resources. Resources may be accessed and overridden individually or collectively, as seen in the examples. If the component does not contain any translatable resource, the default value of this attribute will be 
null. If not, an object containing all resources relevant to the component.

If this component has translations, their documentation immediately follows this doc entry.

componentName.description:
Used to describe the data visualization type for accessibility.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

highlightedCount.description:
Used to indicate number of highlighted nodes in a cell.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

labelAdditionalData.description:
Used for node overflow button

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

labelAndValue.description:
Used to display a label and its value.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

labelClearSelection.description:
Text shown for clearing multiple selection on touch devices.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

labelCountWithTotal.description:
Used to display a count out of a total.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

labelDataVisualization.description:
Label for data visualizations used for accessibility.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

labelGroup.description:
Used to indicate group info for nbox drawer and group nodes for accessibility.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

labelInvalidData.description:
Text shown when the component receives invalid data.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

labelNoData.description:
Text shown when the component receives no data.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

labelOther.description:
Used for the other label which aggregates small data values.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

labelSize.description:
Used to indicate size of node drawer and group nodes for accessibility.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

stateCollapsed.description:
Used to describe the collapsed state for accessibility.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

stateDrillable.description:
Used to describe a drillable object for accessibility.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

stateExpanded.description:
Used to describe the expanded state for accessibility.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

stateHidden.description:
Used to describe the hidden state for accessibility.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

stateIsolated.description:
Used to describe the isolated state for accessibility.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

stateMaximized.description:
Used to describe the maximized state for accessibility.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

stateMinimized.description:
Used to describe the minimized state for accessibility.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

stateSelected.description:
Used to describe the selected state for accessibility.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

stateUnselected.description:
Used to describe the unselected state for accessibility.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

stateVisible.description:
Used to describe the visible state for accessibility.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

getRow.description: Returns an object with the following properties for automation testing verification of the NBox row at the specified value.

getColumn.description: Returns an object with the following properties for automation testing verification of the NBox column at the specified value.

getCell.description: Returns an object with the following properties for automation testing verification of the NBox cell at the specified row and column values.

params.name: rowValue
params.description: The id of the containing row.

params.name: columnValue
params.description: The id of the containing column.

getGroupNode.description: Returns an object with the following properties for automation testing verification of the NBox group node with the specified group category string.

params.name: groupCategory
params.description: A string corresponding to the groupCategory value of the nodes represented by this group node.

getDialog.description: Returns an object with the following properties for automation testing verification of the currently active NBox dialog.

getContextByNode.description:
Returns an object with context for the given child DOM node. This will always contain the subid for the node,
defined as the 'subId' property on the context object. Additional component specific information may also be included.

For more details on returned objects, see context objects.

setProperty.description:
Sets a property or a single subproperty for complex properties and notifies the component
of the change, triggering a [property]Changed event.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to set. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

params.name: value
params.description: The new value to set the property to.

getProperty.description: Retrieves a value for a property or a single subproperty for complex properties.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to get. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

setProperties.description: Performs a batch set of properties.

params.name: properties
params.description: An object containing the property and value pairs to set.

contextMenu.description:
The contextMenu slot is set on the oj-menu within this element. 
This is used to designate the JET Menu that this component should launch as a context menu on right-click, Shift-F10, Press & Hold, or component-specific gesture. 
If specified, the browser's native context menu will be replaced by the JET Menu specified in this slot.

The application can register a listener for the Menu's ojBeforeOpen event. The listener can cancel the launch via event.preventDefault(), 
or it can customize the menu contents by editing the menu DOM directly, and then calling refresh() on the Menu.

To help determine whether it's appropriate to cancel the launch or customize the menu, the ojBeforeOpen listener can use component API's to determine which 
table cell, chart item, etc., is the target of the context menu. See the JSDoc and demos of the individual components for details. 

Keep in mind that any such logic must work whether the context menu was launched via right-click, Shift-F10, Press & Hold, or component-specific touch gesture.
